rows.label: qst202501_msg0001
rows.name: Something the matter, Zeke?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0002
rows.name:
Take a look over there.
Something's clearly not right.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0003
rows.name: Those are artificial Blades...

rows.label: qst202501_msg0004
rows.name:
So many too!
Why they all gathered here?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0005
rows.name:
I can identify no regular pattern to their
movements. Most likely their command
systems are no longer functional.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0006
rows.name:
They don't have any orders, but they're
just gathering here on their own?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0007
rows.name: Is that even possible?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0008
rows.name: Is this some kind of...berserk state?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0009
rows.name:
Perhaps not quite so simple, but that
understanding will suffice.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0010
rows.name:
A search of the area indicates
that a total of 67 artificial Blades
are active nearby.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0011
rows.name:
If we leave the situation unaddressed,
it's highly likely that more artificial
Blades shall emerge.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0012
rows.name:
Considering all available options, the
most prudent course of action would
be to eliminate them all right now.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0013
rows.name:
You want us to fight these things?
All of them?! Are you crazy?!

rows.label: qst202501_msg0014
rows.name:
KOS-MOS RE: Re: is right, though...
There's no telling what might happen
if we just leave them like this.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0015
rows.name:
We should scrap them before they
cause any harm.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0016
rows.name:
Hey, KOS-MOS RE: Re:. D'you think we can
actually beat all these things?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0017
rows.name: It is possible.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0018
rows.name:
With this number of enemies, the
probability of our complete defeat
is under 12%.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0019
rows.name:
Hoooold on, that doesn't sound
like a sure thing!

rows.label: qst202501_msg0020
rows.name:
It is difficult to predict what may
happen during combat.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0021
rows.name:
This probability seems within the
bounds of acceptable risk for
combat-related activity.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0022
rows.name:
You're scarily calm about this stuff,
you know that?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0023
rows.name:
The more Blades enter a berserk state,
the higher the risks will become.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0024
rows.name:
Please give the order to commence
combat as soon as possible.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0025
rows.name:
All right, let's do this then!
Here goes nothing!
